name: Detect Metal
components: V, S, F (a magnetized nail or nugget of ore)
text: You detect any metal objects or creatures within a 60-foot cone. You can specify all metal objects or one or more specific types of metal (such as silver, cold iron, or a type of skymetal) when you cast this spell; in the case of the latter, you detect only objects or creatures made of the specified metal.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材(一根磁化的钉子或矿石)
duration_zh: 专注, 至多1分钟/等级 (可解消)
text_zh: 你可以探测到60尺锥形内任何金属物体或是生物。你在施展此法术时，可以指定所有金属物体，或是一种或多种类型的金属(例如银、寒铁、或是某种天金)，如果是后者，你只能检测由你所指定金属种类的物体或生物。
